title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Coming To PC - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.04.19
description:
Imran and Tim talk about Red Dead Redemption 2 coming to PC, House of the Dead Remakes, and new Nintendo job listings.

00:01:26 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Black Jack
Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:02:34 - Red Dead Redemption 2 Coming To PC This November, Rockstar Games
00:21:11 - Some Ghost Recon Breakpoint Microtransactions Pulled After Being Posted in "Error," According to Ubisoft, Mike Williams at USGamer
00:27:10 - Randy Pitchford 'Exonerated' In Legal Battle With Ex-Gearbox Lawyer, Matt Kim over at IGN
00:35:38 - Departing ArenaNet President Was Working On Potential Guild Wars Sequel, Stephen Totilo at Kotaku
00:42:10 - House of the Dead 1 and 2 Remakes Confirmed, Alysia Judge at IGN
00:48:25 - Nintendo Hiring For New 2D And 3D Games At Tokyo Studio, from me
00:55:12 -  QUIP
00:56:20 -  THIRD LOVE
00:58:38 - Out today
Reader mail   -
01:00:55 -  - The Hylian Guard
01:06:20 -  - The Nano Biologist
01:09:20 - Squad Up: Nino Cimino(Twitch) - The American Cancer Society
01:10:08 - You‘re Wrong

Thursday: Greg and Imran
Friday: Greg and Tim
Gamescast: Tim, Greg, Fran, and Imran
